com.io7m.r2.core

Interface R2DepthAttachmentCreateType

  • All Superinterfaces:
    R2DepthAttachmentSpecificationType
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    R2DepthAttachmentCreate

    public interface R2DepthAttachmentCreateType
extends R2DepthAttachmentSpecificationType
    A preexisting depth texture that will be used as an attachment on a created framebuffer.

      R2DepthPrecision precision()
